discourse_list.title: I think uniswap should be extended to more networks~

content.content: Uniswap is a cross era product. It has saved eth, but the current high gas of eth actually does great damage to uniswap. I suggest that uniswap should upgrade itself to be easier to deploy to different networks, not only EVM, but also any network. Moreover, each deployment does not need a cumbersome voting process. I believe that uniswap will quickly eat the DEX market in any network, Then improve their market share.
Agreed! Check out our proposal to do just this by deploying on Celo! [Temperature Check] Uniswap x Celo: Green Pool for Treasury Proposal Here’s to more to come
Agree with this as well. Many networks are just using V2 copies anyways.
